授業方法: This class will be conducted in English only, and students are expected to use English exclusively while participating. This course is held as a workshop with discussions, self-directed research and presentations, with communication and materials primarily in English. Currently, the intention is for this class to be taught face-to-face; adaptations may be made in light of changing conditions and university policies. Students are expected to follow safety protocols (i.e. wearing masks and respecting social distancing) during all face-to-face classes.
